name: Rock Paper SPACE
description:
Yo, this is my first ever game

It is a rock papers scissors game where ties are broken by a quick time event, in which the player has to quickly press SPACE to get the point.

Time to react depends on the difficulty:

EASY - 1 second

MEDIUM -  0.5 of a second

IMPOSSIBLE - 0.25 of a second

But remember!

Clicking space outside of a tie will give a point to the enemy
